bug.author: aaronmarkham
bug.summary: switching versions while on a specific API page loses the anchor
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
Say you're looking a specific API for a released version, then want to look at in master. You're on: <denchmark-link:http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.2.1/api/python/ndarray/ndarray.html#mxnet.ndarray.NDArray.tostype>http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.2.1/api/python/ndarray/ndarray.html#mxnet.ndarray.NDArray.tostype</denchmark-link>
Then you go to the versions dropdown and select master. It should keep you on the same topic, but with the new version. This used to work. It doesn't anymore.
